author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Gengfu Xiao, xiaogf@wh.iov.cn, or Wei Wang, wangwei@wh.iov.cn.

fn.p: Present address: Shaobo Wang, Department of Pediatrics, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, CA, USA.

Citation Guo J, Jia X, Liu Y, Wang S, Cao J, Zhang B, Xiao G, Wang W. 2020. Screening of natural extracts for inhibitors against Japanese encephalitis virus infection. Antimicrob Agents Chemother 64:e02373-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/AAC.02373-19.
